title: How Every Game Is This Pre-Season
body:
Did your team win?

- Yes

Was it a dominating win?

- Yes

Did your team lose?

- Yes

Did you lose hard?

- Yes

Can we get out of this meta already. No patches coming out to fix the problem of everyone doing INSANE damage. People are getting 7+ kills every game before its even 10 minutes! This is just so unfun.

replies.body: how can your team win and lose at the same time?

> [{quoted}](name=Shadòw,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-04T23:52:46.475+0000)
>
> how can your team win and lose at the same time?

he didn't say at the same time, where did you get this from?

> Did your team win?

>Yes
Was it a dominating win?

>Yes
Did your team lose?

>Yes
Did you lose hard?

>Yes
Schrödigers team hehe
getting this joke made me feel like a scientist for some reason

> [{quoted}](name=Fizz Akabane,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-05T00:07:06.077+0000)
>
> Schrödigers team hehe

Well put sir, well put.

> [{quoted}](name=Shadòw,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-04T23:52:46.475+0000)
>
> how can your team win and lose at the same time?

Is English not your first language?
If you treat the win and lose as separate cases then you could also treat the lose and lose harder as separate cases as all which would also ruin the "meme" OP is trying to make.

> [{quoted}](name=My Waifu Vanilla,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-05T17:45:58.438+0000)
>
> If you treat the win and lose as separate cases then you could also treat the lose and lose harder as separate cases as all which would also ruin the "meme" OP is trying to make.

Yeah English is funny that way, that's what the whole movie Airplane is built around, but most people who speak it fluently are able grasp the subtleties. That's why I asked if English wasn't the guys first language.

This was my game Yesterday


Did your jungler disconnect?

* Yes

Did the enemy Nasus get free farm?

* Yes

Did you lose the first Baron?

* Yes

Did you win? 

* Yes, because my team was competent enough to make a 4v5 comeback.
Low elo games ... smh...
it wasn't even a low elo game, he only plays normals. it literally doesn't count.
neither do rankeds since s5 ended

> Did you win? 
> 
> * Yes, because ennemy team was incompetent enough to lose a 5v4
Enemy team has to be real bad to lose with a stacked Nasus and baron

Oh, that game was nucking futs. Lasted almost 50 minutes, I think our jg dc'ed at 25 or 30 (probably computer issues since he was murdering the other jg), Nasus was killing everyone, yet my team remained chilled. As support Bard, I actually made an Execution, eventually Mortal Reminder, just so we had 1 more person to hurt that healing.

What amazes me the most though is that even though it was 4v5, we ended it 65 kills to their 37, and the last team fight was hilariously one-sided. I would have to rewatch the game just to see how that's even possible.
But then this proves the op's point: your team was snowballing so hard that neither the afk nor the farmed Nasus mattered!

My friend, maybe you've taken a few heavy hits to the head recently, but I'll take this chance to inform you that after 50 minutes, **everyone** is full build.

"Hurr Durr snowball won the game" makes no sense in the scenario presented to us by Baron Barian.

Nay, there is a far simpler explanation for the seemingly unbelievable occurrence; It was a normal game.

:risitaslaugh:
What was their comp?
No dc and you woulda' stomped that game, most likely.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-05T00:02:14.689+0000)

your team was challengers?
No, it was an unranked draft game with strangers and I haven't really tried to climb ranked, but thank you. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=F2feZAg8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-05T00:02:14.689+0000)
>
> This was my game Yesterday
> 
> 
> Did your jungler disconnect?
> 
> * Yes
> 
> Did the enemy Nasus get free farm?
> 
> * Yes
> 
> Did you lose the first Baron?
> 
> * Yes
> 
> Did you win? 
> 
> * Yes, because my team was competent enough to make a 4v5 comeback.

Pretty sure its because the enemy team was legit awful at the game. they were all inting.

Reading these posts is so annoying. Honestly, while playing in the pre season I still feel like I have a lot of agency over whether or not I win a game. 

These posts just seem like a long chain of circle jerk. Hope Riot does not cave into these whiny posts.
Ikr ! I'm honestly tired if seeing these posts about how adc are broken and how new runes are bad , they never get tired

I have comebacks all the time...
Not every game can be a comeback guys!

The only thing that really changed is that laning phase is over too quickly but comeback still happen often.

My issue so far is that maybe 1 out of 10 games feels like a real match, the other 9 are stompfests from either side, And it is awesome when you are the one king konging your way down mid lane, but when you are the lil blonde chick or the smashed fighter planes its not so fun

Yeah, the issue is that when the enemy botlane wins hard (most of the time) they end up dictating how the rest of the game goes. One game I won my lane hard as Camille, but I couldn't splitpush because the enemy team was playing midlane aram, constantly teamfighting. Me splitpushing would've made it a 4 v 5 and lost us the game. Also my friggin kayn decided to leave MID TEAMFIGHT to save our tier two toplane tower. In the end he lost us the game by letting them take advantage of the 4v3. It drives me insane that the enemy team could do that so easily but at the same time, players aren't adapting.
I thougth the whole idea of preseason was changing the meta, and we are still in Season 7.
I remember when getting like 10 kills in a game was something crazy. now people are getting like 20+ kills in a game and it's just nasty

A) Hasn't that been a thing for a while?
B) I'm really curious as to what you people's ranked games are like. My bronze games go on forever even when one team snowballs.
For fucks sake stop it with this shit arguement. If there isnt alot of damage there is a tank meta which you will complain about. The problem is melee vs range.

Back when I used to play this shitfest of a game, I mained supp, champs like leona. alister, maokai, rakan, and usually won lane easily( then my adc gets cocky and thinks he can 1 v 5 the enemy team and gets caught out all the time) The moment the enemy laners got anywhere near creeps, they would be dead, they could not stay under their turret because after lv5 on alister or leona you can tank that turret so easily, so they can't stay there either, so what are they supposed to do?

Stomp or get stomped.
Season 7 was basically this way, but they got to do worse now :D
Fix your stuff please, expecially your matchmaking, which probably just forces a 50% win ratio, and in order to do that just intentionally makes unbalanced teams.

Especially in normals ive noticed this to be the case.  Wins and losses both feel like stomps 80% of the time and 1/5 games max feels like its actually pretty evenly matched.  

Its really dumb, winning super easily with all lanes dominating (kill and level advantages) or losing in the same way just feels really crappy.  

Although I personally think its in large part due to the holiday season, a lot of casuals who don't play regularly have free time and are playing right now, because they don't play that often their MMR (whether normals or ranked) does not match their skill level so they get put into games that are either far below or far above their skill level and either stomp or get stomped.

Why should i go to vegas if i want to gamble? I can just do it in LoL if i get the better jg i win 99% of the times. They have too much impact while having insane EXP gains in the jg. also if the enemy jg towerdives bot lane around 6-7 mins for sure u lost the game for the time u respawn and u run back to lane u already lost 2 towers and u  are 2k gold behind due to towers having little to no impact.
